metadata.course_title: Introduction to Data science and AI
metadata.department: Department of Computer Science and Engineering

sections.About:
Course

DIT408

Bachelor’s level

7.5 credits (ECTS)

Offered by the
Department of Computer Science and Engineering
at the
Faculty of Science and Technology
sections.Entry requirements:
To be eligible for the course students should have:

- 7.5 hec in basic mathematics (containing e.g. calculus, linear algebra and/or discrete mathematics) or the course Applied mathematical thinking (DIT025 or equivalent).

- 7,5 hec mathematical statistics (e.g. MSG810 or DIT862 or DIT278 or similar) or the two courses DIT847 and DIT278 (or equivalent) or the course DIT022.

- 7,5 hec Programming in a General-Purpose Language (e.g. C/C++/Java/Python or similar.

Applicants must prove knowledge of English: English 6/English B or the equivalent level of an internationally recognized test, for example TOEFL, IELTS.
sections.Selection: Selection is based upon the number of credits from previous university studies, maximum 165 credits.
sections.Tuition:
Full education cost: 17 753 SEK

First payment: 17 753 SEK

No fees are charged for EU and EEA citizens, Swedish residence permit holders and exchange students.

More information about tuition fees
sections.Additional information:
Application closed, late application opens 15 July 2025.
